name: The INDIAN PACIFIC: Australia's Greatest Train - Sydney to Perth | Full Trip Video
description:
WATCH NOW: My AMAZING trip to the Isles of Scilly! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=na9DkXYffQ8

Check out my Europe by Train Bright Trip guide: https://www.brighttrip.com/europebytrain

The Indian Pacific is one of the world's finest train journeys, carrying passengers on a three night, four day excursion, the full 4,352km across Australia between Sydney and Perth. This is a must-take trip for the rail enthusiast, being in the top five longest trains in the world, and traversing the world's longest straight piece of track (478km) on the Trans Australian Railway on the Nullarbor Plain. It's a luxury experience, encompassing several off-train stops and excursions at places of interest along the route.

On this trip, I was kindly hosted by Great Southern Rail, who operate this magnificent train. Tickets and journey information can be found at: https://journeybeyondrail.com.au/journeys/indian-pacific/

This video is not sponsored and all editorial and commentary is my own, and not approved by the hosting company.

I hope you enjoy the video!
